category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EPM_resource_pool_restrict_subscription
preference.preference_description: Restricts the resource pools available for subscription based on user membership in the "Resource Pool Subscription" dialog. Valid Values: ON - the user can subscribe only to groups and roles for which he/she is a member. OFF - the users can subscribe to all groups and roles. This is the default value.
